baselineMeta.methodology: Statistical aggregation of 100+ test runs collected from production telemetry via emitter.ts and collector.ts during baseline establishment phase (sprint 1-2)
baselineMeta.collectionSource: self-healing test suite (Business BDD handlers invoked through comprehensive-business-bdd-specifications.json)
baselineMeta.rebaseThresholdDescription: Automatically trigger rebase if > 5% drift from baseline across all handlers (configurable via shape.budgets.json)
baselineMeta.confidence: high for handlers with 30+ samples, medium for 10-29, low for <10
notes: Baseline is production-representative snapshot from stable test runs
Used as reference for performance anomaly detection (3+ std deviations = anomaly)
Coverage confidence tied to sample size; low-sample handlers may require additional runs
Baseline should be refreshed quarterly or when service architecture changes significantly
